1.content:
Here are some scenarios to choose from:

Scenario 1: Babies suddenly become gigantic and smart and start to take over the world from grown-ups.

Scenario 2: Babies start growing and developing kaiju powers. They want to make the world their playground and destroy adults.

Scenario 3: A baby genius develops a potion that makes babies giant-sized and gives them super-powers.

Scenario 4: A god-like baby comes to Earth and makes all babies gigantic so they can end the age of adults.
1.title: Pick a scenario

choices: POV of a brother of his baby sister who is growing
11.content: Who's POV should we follow in this story?
11.title: Giant baby takeover

111.content: But before this story begins, what gender is the growing baby?
111.title: POV of a baby growing

choices: I decide to eat everything in sight.
1111.content:
Once upon a time I was but a 1 month old bald headed baby boy that happened to be extremely gluttonous, rather obese, and always hungry until one fateful day something happened.

On that fateful day I suddenly grew to a gigantic size while I also was now smarter, as well as being much fatter than ever before.

"Now that I'm a gigantic fat extremely gluttonous hungry baby boy, what can I do next?" I thought.
1111.title: Boy

choices: She plays with her "toys" some more in her neighborhood
Other babies in the neighbourhood start growing
She decides to ''move on to bigger things''
1112.content:
Little Jenny was hardly over a year old, blonde haired and the apple of her parent's eyes. Now her parents said Jenny was special and amazing, granted to her mother and father she indeed was but to everyone else she was like most girls her age, drooling, dumb and unable to stand on her own to feet without tipping over in a figurative sense and an actual sense.

It was early morning when a change in Jenny occurred, she was just napping in her crib with drool dripping from her mouth, her head on stuffed bear and her butt in the air. The morning sun was beaming through the blinds, the whole room was at peace as the soft sound of the door creaking as it opened, her mother coming in with a warm bottle of milk, she smiled down at her daughter watching her sleep. After a moment Jenny yawned squirming a bit as a strange stream that looked like a sort of gas, almost like it was out of a cartoon came from the girl.

Jenny's mother swatted the air and chuckled ''Oh my, someone is a stinky pants today!'' her smile faded soon as it kept going, and Jenny kept wiggling around like mad. Jenny breathed deep as the strange gassed filled her body, her body expanded for moment as for moment she ballooned out, as she exhaled her body started to stretch out in size. Jenny body grew more mass, growing and growing until her body was press to the bar of crib, bits of fat pressing out past the bars a bit.

The bars broke, along with the crib, Jenny's mother looked on in horror as her child was getting as big as her now, standing up on her feet looking around with curiosity in her eyes, she went on growing until she hit the roof, breaking it. Along with her body her mind also grew, she could think better and not only was she smarter, something else changed as, upon looking down at her mother cowering in the edge of the room she did not see a loving mother.

Jenny now saw her mother as a plaything, as her servant, not even a human being as something less then even her poopy diapers. Speaking of which she looked down and grinned at her mother as she said one word ''Poopy!'' her mother screamed, seeing her daughter's bare bottom hanging over her and by extension the whole house. The baby giggled crouching down, placing her hands to her cheeks she split them apart, showing the mother the big pink hole. This was the last thing she saw before, with a grunt Jenny let it all out.

Spraying the room with green semi-solid waste was Jenny, soon the house over flowed as it burst apart. She looked around, still growing with each passing minute, it was slowing down but still going for sure.

She spotted two joggers who seemed to have witnessed the scene, to Jenny they seem like ether playthings for her use or slaves to worship her. With a grin she plucked up one jogger, a red haired female in her 20's. She popped the jogger in her mouth and suckled on her body, muffling out her screams, while the other jogger ran for it. Jenny tottered over to the middle of the streets watching people stare or run. she made a gap between her legs, spreading them apart and thrust forward letting out a golden flow of warm pee. The pee flowed like a river down the streets, people got caught in it, being dragged away as Jenny just giggled, watching as people tried to escape. She placed a finger between the stream so it split in two, hitting both sidewalks.


Then...
1112.title: Little Jenny's Big Day

11123.content:
Jenny was far from finished here, she peered around the suburban neighbourhood that she lives in. It was now drenched with urine, giant lakes of pee still covered the area. She thought it looked way better now, but it could look even better, she thought.

It was at this time she felt something strange in her tummy, she grunted and strained, but all that came out was a small fart, nope wasn’t potty time so what could it be. The feeling soon turned into a burning pain, one so bad it made her fall to the ground and grips her belly, whining softly. She looked down at her belly, around the point of pain it was glowing. Yes glowing brightly, a bright green like a neon light.

She burped letting out a strange green coloured wind, the pain felt a bit less after and with a another louder burp it was all gone, along with the glow. At least that how it seem at the moment, as not one minute after her whole body lit up with the strange glow. It felt like lightning was going through her body, painful but powerful.

Jenny groaned putting her hands out and her hands out flat as that lightning shoot out of her and hit the houses on ether side of her as they lit up as well and turned into giant wooden blocks, colour with letters on each face.

She giggled and then pointed her fingers at another building, this time it became a giant pack of diapers, she giggled and decided to use her new found powers on. . .
11123.title: Jenny has the power

12.content:
Say, which side of the story do any of you story writers want to play as?

The Giant Baby Monsters: You basically have your own created giant baby as the monster, and you are trying to destroy the adults by terrorizing their city.

The Military: You are trying to stop the Giant Baby Monsters from destroying the city.

Citizen: Simply put, escape the giant baby monsters.

Last two are reader's choice.
12.title: Which side of the story you want to play as?

121.content:
Repletica
Age: 2
Height: 180ft tall
Appearance: She wears a white diaper with a Godzilla character on it. Has black hair, tan skin, and somehow grew a huge monster tail like Godzilla, claws and talons for her hands and feet.
Powers: Atomic breath, roaring like a monster, invulernability to many attacks.
City she terrorizes: Tokyo, Japan
Bio: No one knew her origin, but one thing for sure. She is the Godzilla of their country. She terrorizes their city to no end, and not even the military can do anything about it. Since she is a giant baby, she does have her baby fun, but most of the time, she acts and behaves like a true giant monster.

Want to use her?
121.title: Repletica!

1212.content:
Name: Mauricio Di Mauro from wunschpunsch the animated series A.K.A. The stay puft marshmallow kitten
Age: 1
Height: 212.5 ft tall
Appearance: He doesn't wear a diaper to begin with, as he's made of conjoined marshmallows. He wears a white sailor hat with a red ribbon attached on the top of it and blue hatband, around his neck is a blue traditional sailor's collar and a red neckerchief.
Powers: stomping, roaring, bashing and eating everything in sight.
City he terrorizes: New York City U.S.A.
Bio: No one knew he existed let alone learn of his origins but one thing's definitely for sure. He's the modern day stay puft marshmallow man of his nation. He terrorizes his city day in day out and nobody can stop this being. Since he's a giant kitten, he can be playful of course, but in reality he acts and behaves like his hero the original stay puft marshmallow man.
1212.title: The stay puft marshmallow kitten.

1213.content:
Susyzilla
Age: 2
Height:100 miles tall
Appearance: She wears a glowing golden diaper with strange red symbols on it. She has caucasian skin, red hair, and golden eyes.
Powers: Atomic breath, laser vision, roars that can blow away cities, nigh-indestructibility, turning other babies into kaiju babies, altering reality.
City she terrorizes: Everywhere
Bio: No one knows where she came from, but it is clear that she wants to destroy adults and rule the world with her kaiju babies. She sometimes plays baby games, but most of the time she is destructive.
1213.title: Susyzilla, goddess of kaiju babies!

choices: Matty uses his mind power to mentally regress all adults.
Matty demands all adults obey them or else.
Matty makes all the babies smarter as well
13.content:
Little Matty was a bright child, unbelievably so; he wasn't just bright, he was full on blinding. He was not even a year old and already he was smarter than any adult. Matty had already been to university where he was the one teaching the teachers, but after proving his smarts he was growing board.

He was different from other babies, little baby toys were dull to him and adults were worse. They were even more dull, plus many of which ether looked down on him or saw him as some kind of freakshow. Babies however they were much more fun, they knew how to truly live they didn't want much, they knew how great diapers were, they didn't say stupid things they just want to be fed and have fun; why to Matty babies were much smarter then any adult.

Matty hatched an idea, he went to his desk where he spend a week working away inside his room until it was done. A small vial of purple liquid, he grinned coming up with an idea. See, Matty was kind of a big celebrity, and he would now use that to put a plan into action it took a month but soon he a company allow him to be main ad for a new milk for babies.

Matt claimed he made the best baby milk ever, great for a developing child he said, for the most part it seemed like normal milk save for a strange purple taint to it. The milk sold like crazy, in less then a week it seemed like every baby in America was drinking it.

Just a few days after being the market something strange happened, one morning Little Matty was no longer little. Matty now stood high above all the adults; this was his plan, his formula worked, he was now giant, along with every other baby that drank it.

That was not the only change, Matty could hear everyone's thoughts, he could feel his mind being more powerful then before. It was different for each baby, he could see one baby that burped out fire or one that let out a huge fart that made anyone who smelled it start to act like an animal, or one baby whose pee melted everything it touched, like it was acid.

Matty, with his new found power and army of super powered babies, decided to take over, the first thing they did was. . .
13.title: Scenario 3

choices: Matty went around regressing all adults in the world
The army came to stop Matty
Matty ruined the city to be rebuilt for baby kind.
131.content:
Matty watched all the adults run around, trying to escape the babies. ''Ha! Not so smart when we're the big ones.'' he chuckled, just then an idea popped into his head. Matty sat down, crushing a few buildings under his butt, and placed both hands to his head as he focused his mind, reading the minds of those close by, and then a bit futher and futher still until he couldn't extend the reach any more, it stopped around the city limits.

''Perfect'' he thought ''just enough for my plan.'' he said putting that plan into action. He used his mind to stop every adult and put his voice into their heads saying ''You adults are the real dumb ones, us babies. we're the smart ones. From now on you're the small ones and we're the big ones so you should act like it!'' he said and with those words, the minds of every adult in the city went blank.

A number got down and crawled around, some started crying while others messed themselves. Matty chucked saying ''you adults are stinky, you need diapers'' he waved his hands as he floated diapers over to every adult and forced them in. Then.....
131.title: Matty used his mind power to mentally regress...

choices: He went with the first idea
Oh no what's this, another baby is challenging his leadership.
1313.content:
Not-so-little Matty had a strange feeling come over him as he used his power, in one quick motion making all the adults around him into feeble-minded diaper-poopers filled him with a strange feeling he never felt before: power. True, he was smarter then anyone but he lacked the power adults had, they stilled controlled his life, but now the tables were turned and he was in charge.

Matty grinned at the ant-like people crawling around, he laughed as he let out a large burning hot gust of gas from his rear, which was followed by a large amount of squishy, mushy baby poop flowing into his diaper like a chunky waterfall. It slowly filled his diaper, dropping down past his waist, still going as the whole backside was a dark greenish-brown now. Soon, with a breaking sound, the diaper dropped from his butt and onto the ground, crushing many buildings and many people under the mountain of poop, and it was a mountain indeed larger than any building in the city for sure.

Matty felt this was right, that him and the babies were at last in their rightful position at the top. He looked around and saw the world with his eyes, but with his mind saw the new world ruled by babies! He tapped his head again and sent a message to fellow babies that went along the lines of ‘’Get rid of this mess!’’

The giant babies moved to different parts of the city, all doing something different. Some simply crushed and knocked over buildings, while others were a bit more creative, such as one who let out a heavy rain storm of piss that sparkled down on the buildings and melted them to nothing. One baby with a very saggy diaper bent over, pointed his rear out and let out a powerful, noisy fart. It was so powerful, it sent his diaper flying off and through many buildings, causing most of the East side to become nothing but rubble with one good shot of his diaper.

It wasn’t long before the city was gone Matty sat on pile of ruined building as he placed his hands onto his forehead again using his power to control the adults. The adults all started to move together like a hivemind as they worked as one, first putting up a giant diaper factory, then a milk factory. See, Matty had planned this out for long while, the milk not only grew him and gave him power, but drinking it kept him young, and it would have no effect on adults, so he was safe.

The adults worked away, and in a week the buildings, or what were once buildings, were replaced by large crib-like things, and what looked like a giant changing mat and many giant-sized toys.

Matty, while happy with this, still wanted more. He had two ideas; his first one was to change the other cities of the world, and his 2nd was to replace all the water in the world with his milk so he would be unstoppable.
1313.title: Good bye boring adult city, hello giant baby world

choices: Next we follow the giant babies taking over the world
On the spaceship as the willing adults are made into babies.
The alien baby starts to mess with the adults still on earth.
The rest of world leaders give into the alien's demands.
14.content:
Ever since mankind found out there was worlds outside of earth they have asked ‘’Are we all alone in the universe or is this life out there?’’, alien life seemed so fake to many, not so much anymore.

First contact with aliens was nothing like anyone thought it would be, there was no warning just one day it appeared. Standing in the city towering over all buildings was the alien, upon seeing it no one knew what to make of it at first most thought it was some kind of fake thing or a giant balloon most likely meant to sell some kind of baby product.

Why baby? Well you see it because standing there in New York was what looked to be a giant baby boy only his skin was a bright green and it diaper was a weird sliver colour and seem more like it was made of something close to a thick foil like material. What made it clear this was no fake, no War of the Worlds-type deal was it spoke, it voice reaching far and wide as it's image and it's voice came on every screen, every radio, just everything.

‘’Greeton hemums, I has come for far far far world.’’ He spoke, his speech slow or kind of slurred, drool dripping from his mouth. People stared awestruck at this unable to comprehend the events taking place before their own eyes.

‘’Looking at world it clear you have many problems which we have decide to help you fix’’ he stated as strange beams shot down from the sky and down to surface everywhere all over the world. Now people thought this alien was going to do stuff like cure cancer, or stop all wars and bring world peace but he soon explained what he actually means.

‘’Firstly we shall get rid of adults, no more adults! Adulthood is a terrible yucky illness that on my world we have gotten rid of, no one ages passed 3 and we have never been happier’’ he preached people were both confused and scared by this, he stuck his head out toward one of the beams heading up to the sky.

‘’Don’t worry, you have a choice all adults who wanna join us in baby hood step into the beam and you will be taken to our ship where we shall scrub your mind clear of adultness and change your bodies. Or don’t it no be big we will simply have to force you or destroy you. Ether or.’’ He explain many scream and panic ether running away from the alien baby or to one of the beams.

Not long after this the president came on tv saying they will not give into this alien's demands and to stand together as a nation to drive off this threat, but it came to a sudden end as a a green glow bathed the whole earth and following that, a giant hand plucked the president out of his office.

The hand belonged to his own baby son, now holding him in his finger, grinning at his father before dropping the president down his throat and into his belly. All over the earth other events like this happen as it seems every baby had grown to giant sizes.
14.title: It Came From Outer Space!

144.content: The entire EU has fallen, but there are safe havens for the humans who do not want to convert. Many world leaders show their true colors. Dennis Muilenburg rises to power and he turns out to be Xenu! Xenu has been engineering his Thetan controlling technology over the years. He survived by absorbing the CEO of the company that his company merged with. Russia's Vladimir Putin is in fact Perun from Slavic Myth. With his hammer he protects Russia. The Gigantic Alien Baby tried to attack Russia, for Russia's population has not been touched by the Alien's Control. Winter has been in Russia for a few days, and everybody knows that you never invade Russia in winter. This was a very devastating loss for Team Alien. Xenu continues to kill those trying to convert with his DC-8s. Chicago and the States around Chicago have been cleared of giant babies.
144.title: The rest of world leaders give into the alien

15.content:
Scenario 5: Somehow an intergalactic alien race (who are just like babies) abduct all of the worlds babies for experimentation, and then one day all their babies return, but they aren't the same ever since.

Scenario 6: Somehow, before the dawn of time, they were babies that were gigantic that changed civilization forever. As a result, man treated the babies as gods. Babies were created before man and now they are the gods.

Scenario 7: All of the babies (gigantic) were from an alien race and they were sent from an alien planet to destroy or conquer Earth. (Different from option 5 as they were abducted and this is their new origins)

Scenario 8: Alternative Earth, the babies rule everything, and everyone else are either pets or slaves

Really didn't have alot of good options to be honest.
15.title: New scenarios

152.content: Who do you wish to play as in this baby-oriented world?
152.title: Scenario 6

choices: Julia needs to get a new diaper
1522.content:
The planet Earth is amazing, housing so much life, from the birds of the sky, the fish of sea, even the grass of the land; but nothing can quite compare to that of the giants that populate the surface. Long before man have the giant infants stood, they look like babies, even act like babies, and maybe they are, but to all mankind they are gods.

Early man were the first to worship them, they followed in their shadows for safety as no predator could stand against the might of the giants. To them, the babies were protectors, and in thanks, they served them.
Time moved on and more giants populated the land each one of them born from a small mother and growing to giant sizes in less then a day. Now some times the babies shrink down in a few years becoming regular people but most stayed as giant babies refusing to grow.

Around the time of Rome a philosopher of sorts started to preach that these giants were not gods but humans not to be worshiped, people believed him for a short time, but changed their minds as he was soon drowned in a lake of pee from one of the giants. Rome it self fell not long after, being brought down to rubble in a matter of hours after the giants dropped their soiled diapers on it.

All that remains of the Roman Empire is a mountain made of dirty diapers, everyone is told this as a warning to dare not defy the gods or else they will punish you. Many civilizations were built since then, all ruined now by the giants.

Modern day, not like the one you would know as their are no large buildings, no huge cities as after thousands of years with babies ruining them the people thought that building such things only anger the gods. All they build now was for the gods, giant cribs, giant diapers, giant toys as most people only lived to serve their gods. There are a small number who do not see them as gods but monsters or simply confused people but they are usually caught and brought to one of the gods to be used by them, but to most they were gods and being picked by one is the greatest honour.

Where in our world New York would stand there was mountains of giant used diapers was but small huts that people live in, giant blocks and animal like toys, along with a giant crib where the giant god Julia was sleeping. Standing on the side of the crib were a large group of people bowing down as one stood saying out loud

''Great one, we present ourselves to your might!'' this got a reply of shorts as Julia snorted and let out a hot fart onto them blowing most of them away. The ones they manage to stay on were picked up by the now awake baby who shoved them in her diaper, this was the happiest moment of their lives before it was snuffed out by a really large poop.

Julia sat on the crib sticking her bottom out over it as she grunted, letting out another wet fart as her diaper started sagging now hanging close to the ground, many gather under it to touch it and bow to it, soon the straps of her diaper snapped and crushed them under it.
1522.title: All hail The Poopy Diaper Gods

1523.content: Is the giant toddler a boy or a girl?
1523.title: Giant toddler

15231.content:
Jack was the 200-foot tall toddler god of New York City. He had brown hair and green eyes and wore a glowing golden diaper. He loved to use the tiny city he governed as a playground, but he also was kind enough to help his tiny adult worshipers with some of their problems.

What was Jack doing today?
15231.title: Boy

154.content:
Think of this as a new Earth now these days. The babies tower over the adults in hundreds of feet height, and everyone else is treated as pets (their toys) or slaves (their toys or food). The Earth adjusted to their size, and they control everything in the world. If a baby gets too old, then they are shrunk to become a pet or slave, and so forth. There is a lot to this concept, but I will let you decide on that yourself.

Who will you play as?
154.title: Giant Babies Rule the Earth

1542.content: Is the teen a guy or a girl?
1542.title: A teen

choices: Find a family to stay with.
Took to long to decide, I got captured!
15421.content:
I have spent the majority of my life now trying to flee from the babies that tower over all of us. Everywhere I go, there are leftovers from previous "people meals," enormous diapers all over the place that are leftovers from the titanic toddlers, half-crushed bodies, and all other sorts of awful sights. All of our existences are useless; we live only to serve the giant babies. There are trillions of us little people, and at least a million of those big babies.

My first encounter was my little brother. He is one of the giant boys, in fact, today is his third birthday. I don't know where he is right now, because he's always wandering away.

Today is just another one of those days for us littles. Actually, our goal is the same every single day: survival. It seems to be getting tougher and tougher these days, especially since I am getting older and realizing how fucked up this whole world is. My parents died at the hands of my little brother when he was only a year old. They were attempting to change his diaper, and after they had untaped both sides, the front of it flopped forward and crushed both of them instantly. It's hard to think about, so I usually try my best not to.

Now where should I go today, I think to myself.
15421.title: Guy

155.content:
Scenario 9: Perhaps instead of giant human babies, perhaps giant monster babies of famous giant monsters?

Scenario 10: Maybe all babies can grow in height by their own will. I am so running out of ideas.
155.title: New ideas

choices: The giant growing child's point of view.
The giant growing toddler's point of view.
1552.content: Which character's point of view do you choose to follow?
1552.title: Scenario 10

choices: A teen with a baby sister
15523.content: Who else's point of view would you like to follow?
15523.title: Someone else

1553.content:
Scenario 11: How about babies shrink cities and keep them in a daycare?

Scenario 12: A baby girl comes into the world who has magic powers to change reality to allow the dawn of the planet of the babies?
1553.title: More options

15533.content: What if the adults, kids, and teens never existed at all, and the world was just babies?
15533.title: STILL MORE?

155332.content: What if anyone over the age of 5 was regressed back?
155332.title: More

1553321.content:
One day for some unknown reason every person in the world over the age of 5 suddenly found themselves growing younger until they reached an age between 1 and 5. No one was spared of the regression and in the space of five minutes the planet earth became solely populated by babies.

In response to what happened a few leaders attempted to explain what happened. The President, now a 3 year old toddler told the people that the massive regression was possibly the work of terrorists, though no evidence had been found. The Pope, who had become a 1 year old newborn and despite the fact that he could barely talk, explained that what transpired was a gift from god. It was a chance to return to innocence and to begin again. He even managed to give a speech about the whole thing, which because of his trouble speaking was so long that he had to get his diaper changed three times by the time he was finished.

Speaking of diapers, they quickly became the biggest selling product as everyone now needed them again. And because everyone was wearing them toilets were no longer used and discontinued. Surprisingly a vast majority of people preferred using their diapers over using the toilet and so the transition to diapers went much smoother than expected.

Anyways after about ten years mankind managed to change their world to suit their new ages and life returned to normal.

You begin to explore this new baby only world by following a young...
1553321.title: Regression world?

15533212.content: How about we follow one miss Mary Collin, a preschool teacher before the regression who trying to find a place in the new world after the needs for school is gone with no more children being born and everyone being babies.
15533212.title: Girl

155332122.content: How about one Sally Quine a fashion model who after the regression goes from modelling the latest designer outfits to the latest designer diapers?
155332122.title: Nah

choices: To give the crowd more of a show
1553321222.content:
Sally Quine ten years ago today she was a busty brunet know for posing nude in magazines, but that was before the event happen. Ten years ago to this day 10 am eastern time did everyone sudden become younger, at that time Sally was walking on stage with her fellow models when all of sudden she felt something odd in her body. Her body just let go, starting with her bottom and right into her new designer dress. Bowel control you see was the first thing to go follow, the inside of the body changed first following by the outside; it was quite messing and took a awful long time to clean it all up.

No one knows still what caused it and it seems like no one will, most thought it wouldn't last long, like maybe it will passed but their minds change once everyone who should have turned six again were de-age to babyhood once again. People were split a lot of people were understandably upset, many were happy with being not only young but also the fact they could possibly live forever now.

In the tens years since the world have change quite a bit, most adults things were ether made smaller and safer for young soft bodies or gotten rid of, roads for one thing were made of soft plastic and sidewalks replaced with soft foam like mats like the kind you find in daycare. Cars also remade and were more like the toy ones for children or what looked like strollers that could be moved by the passenger as the old ones were now totally unusable for most of the population. Toilets were removed all together, as they were pointless as everyone was in diapers now. A few people tried to use toilets most those above two but were unable to hold it, they got used to it. Most people were 3 and under who simply didn't even think about diapers, their now baby like minds told them it was right. The strange thing was some of the adult part of the mind reminded like memories, and some bits of how to talk but they were more childish now.


Sally was one of the adults regressed, after it happen she was upset for while with all her clothes not fitting anymore and it seem she was out of work. Sally however is more clever, she saw all the boring diapers, all white plain and decide to make it more fashionable. In the ten years since she made the diaper fashion league, made to show how wonderful and pretty diapers truly are.

In celebration of ten years she was holding her biggest show yet, she stood well sat on her padded butt waiting for the curtains to open so she can show her stuff. The curtains yanked open with darkness in front of her, a low hush over the crowds and then lights blasted on hitting her as the crowd roared. She crawled out giving a smirk to the crowd reaching the end of the run way and turning around showing her shining pink diaper outfited with a cute design, a bonnet and a cute little bib. babies shouted out ''Show us already, do it Sally!''

She giggled, she knew what it means it what she was known for as the first model to do it. She clenched her fist tight and grunted hard her face turned red, she stuck her butt out in to the air as stink came from her diaper slowly a bulge grew with in, rapidly getting bigger and bigger until the pink become a greenish brown as it sagged on teh ground. She sighed as the crowd went wild. Right then she decide
1553321222.title: It's The Latest Fashion!

choices: Her agent who loved her surprise performance
Some excited fans who want to meet her
15533212221.content:
Seeing her fans go wild Sally decided to go one step further and do something she had never done before. She wiggled her stinky butt once more before rolling onto her back and spreading her legs, giving the crowd an unobstructed view of her full diaper. Sally then began to kick her legs in a frustrated fashion looking like she was uncomfortable with her messy padding when in truth she wasn't.

When she was first regressed ten years ago she didn't enjoyed pooping herself at all at first especially considering what happened the first time. But after a few years she got used to it and eventually learned to love it. Now Sally enjoyed pushing a warm load into her diaper and she enjoyed it so much she turned it into her signature move on the runway. It instantly made her famous and around the world and also earned Sally the nickname the "poo poo princess".

The crowd settled down and became silent wondering what she was doing. Noticing that she had their full attention Sally then called out in a loud voice so everyone could hear, "I made a big poo poo" she said while rubbing the front of her diaper with her left hand, "And I need my diaper changed" Gesturing with her free hand one of her assistants came crawling out from backstage pulling a diaper bag. Realizing what was about to happen the crowd began to slowly get excited as they watch her assistant pull out the changing supplies.

"Change her! Change her!" they chanted as the assistant undid the tapes on Sally's diaper. The crowd then held their breath watching as she slowly opened up her diaper revealing her large poopy mess, the sight of which made them absolutely go nuts. Sally giggled as they continued to go wild even as her assistant removed her diaper wrapping it up before holding it up to the audience, some babies trying to reach for it. Setting it aside for the moment she then proceeded to wipe her rear while Sally moved around trying to show off her cute baby bottom. This was the first time she had ever been completely naked during a show and she was going to make the most out of it.

"Look at her, not only are her diapers cute but so is her butt." "Only she could make a diaper change look so cool!" were some of the many comments she heard from the crowd and made her smile. Her assistant quickly powdered her and taped her up in a brand new pink designer diaper. Gathering up her old diaper and the supplies she quickly crawled off stage.

Realizing that it was time for her to head back Sally decided to end her show with an old favorite of hers. Rolling back onto all fours she wiggled her freshly diapered rear toward the audience while turning her head to give them a wink. She started to crawl toward the curtain but when she reach the middle of the runaway she stopped. Sally balled her hands and planting her feet slowly stood up to the amazement of the crowd, though she knew they were just playing along having seen this before.

Reaching back with her hand she gave the back of her diaper a squeeze causing it to crinkle before taking a few steady careful steps forward. To everyone she looked like a toddler learning how to walk for the first time and they clapped for her. Sally giggled stretching her arms out in front of her as she picked up the pace. As she walked the last few feet of the runaway into the backstage the curtain closed behind her as the sound of loud applause continued. Seeing that she was done Sally fell back onto all fours as walking really tired her out.

She was then paid a visit by...
15533212221.title: A Star Is Changed

1553322.content: A 3-year-old girl who loves diapers becomes gigantic and magical and wants to make other toddlers giants and put everyone back in diapers.
1553322.title: MORE

15533221.content: One lovely day in Seattle Washington a little girl by the name of Molly was playing in her back yard. She had a dress on with a pink pull-up, she was potty training. She was playing on her swing set when she she fell into some mud, but this was no ordinary mud. This mud began to glow and then absorb into Molly's body. She did not scream or cry as it felt good to her. The mud went into her body and then was gone. Molly then went back to playing until her mommy came out and told her to come in for...
15533221.title: Diaper takeover

choices: Just then she started to grow
Mollys mom comes over and begins to spank her
155332212.content: "Molly it is time to go potty in the bathroom like a big girl" Molly's mom shouted from the sliding glass door. "No mama I want to stay in diapers forever" Molly said to her mom. "Well that is too bad missy, now get in here and go potty you are not a big girl yet when you are you can decide if you want to wear diapers as of now I tell you what to do" her mom said starting to get mad. "I want to be bigger now" Molly said...
155332212.title: Potty time

1553322121.content: How tall does she get?
1553322121.title: Just then she started to grow

15533222.content:
Two Ideas

One: The government decides to make super weapons by injecting people with a super serum, the serum seem to not work, at least on adults, but upon trying it on infants it works; too well, it causes the babies to grow giant and gives them insane powers. The babies break out and rampage across the earth.

Two; A pair of twins are born with reality warping powers, upon seeing how unhappy their parents are as grown-ups and how happy they and other babies are, they decide to use their powers to change all adults physically and/or mentally into infants.
15533222.title: More choices

155332222.content:
Sierra and Finn were both special. They could do something no one else could do, change reality. They were about to test the very limits of there powers by making everyone happy. They had noticed how unhappy grown ups were and how happy babies were, so they decided to help there parents and everyone by making them babies again. Finn had been reluctant at first, he didn't want to give up mommy milk or having his parents not be able to do big people things, so they decided to just make it mental. But Sierra didn't want to see old people like that, so they decided to make all the adults be when they were prettiest (aka the prime of there life's). It took a lot of hammering out the details, (they would have baby clothes, people talked childishly, no one was really fat or unappealing physically, things like that) but they had finally decided. They focused and combined there powers, and the flash that accompanied there changes happened.

At first they thought it didn't work, but then they looked around and happily cooed as they realized the changes had taken effect. The rooms décor was infantile now, and they heard there mommy making music in the kitchen like they did.

Before the flash there mother Molly was making soup for her and her husband Jack when he got home. She was still wearing her smart blue pantsuit and had her curly brown hair in a bun. She took a taste with a different spoon than the one she used to stir the soup (using the stirring spoon to taste was a way to spread germs) and she tasted it. Then the flash happened and Molly was on the floor wearing a pink diaper and bib that did nothing to hide her boobies while magic took care of dinner. To Molly this wasn't strange, the magic that was making her and her hubby soup did the things that babies couldn't do. If she couldn't change her diaper or didn't want to feed her family the magic did it. The magic made sure the world functioned even though there were no adults. It was the magic that made the play money and ensured there were toys and diapees at stores, and made complicated things work. Big babies still did there jobs, but it was the magic that actually did work. She was currently using spoons and pots to make music, or more accurately make noise. She bobbed her curly and pink bowed head around as she drummed.

Jack sighed a bit before assuming a happy face to show his kids. He was going to say, "Honey, I'm home." His business suit was generic and his tie felt like a noose. He bowed his black haired head to prepare a smile. Then the flash happened and his smile became genuine, opening the door and he toddled in saying, "Me home!" He now wore only a sesame street diaper (cartoon characters being the same in the new baby world). He looked around the living room and saw his twin kids giggling at the fact there daddy was wearing a diaper. Molly eagerly crawled in and hugged her baby husband.

The family continued there infantile day, feeding themselves soup and all having a bath together. Mommy and daddy put the kids in there crib and departed to there own crib to have some bang-bang (sex) and then sleep. The twins smiled, knowing they had made everyone happy.

-------------

Alright, do we follow the family in there new babyish life or look at other big babies. There are quite a few of them, given the twins regressed every human on earth. And as the author I have some requests, if you choose option 2 please include who they were, what they were doing before the flash, what they were doing after, and for the choices to be either to follow that big baby or a different baby. thank you.
155332222.title: Magical twins!

choices: other aspects of the baby world
1553322222.content:
In an office building many people worked boring jobs. But soon the twins would change everything.

Andrew, a dark skinned male, sipped his coffee mug as he and Jonson, a lighter skinned man, talked. The third of there merry band, Maria, a brunet with large breasts, had gone to answer the call of nature. Then the flash happened and everything changed.

Suddenly everyone in the building went from business casual to baby casual, the dress code now being ties and diapers. These diapers ranged from sesame street to paw patrol. Andrew and Jonson both wore paw patrol diapers and instead of mugs of coffee they held babas of milky. Jon-Jon (as Jonson was now known) asked Andrew, "Did yous see da newest paw patwol?" Andrew popped out his baba and said eagerly, "Yes, it was so exciting."

Then in toddled Maria, a paw patrol diaper around her loins and a tie resting between her boobies. She eagerly announced, "Me use-d da potty all by meselfs!" Andrew was awed but Jon-Jon was skeptical. He babbled, "Show me your diapee." Maria eagerly twirled, showing that she had indeed not used her diaper. Jon-Jon was awed now too. It was hard getting to the potty in time. Only a super-genius could really do it in this new baby world.

------

Word of Maria's accomplishment spread like wildfire through the massive playpen that was once the cube farm of the office building. One woman was not happy for Maria. This was Lily, the self proclaimed queen bee of the office. With her blond hair, blue eyes, Nordic good looks, six feet tall and a figure many would kill for she more than deserved the title. Now she was just a big brat, and she sucked her paci angrily as her friend Amy, a red head with a similar figure to her, changed her poopy diapee.

Lily said, "Me queen bee, and wes gonna prove it." Amy, who had once followed Lily out of love but now because Lily was her bestest friend, asked, "Hows we gonna do dat?"

Lily smiled and whispered her plan.

-------

do we continue this or check out another aspect of the baby world?
1553322222.title: business babies

155332223.content:
Okay, here is a cool idea. What if the giant babies were ancient giant monsters that used to terrorize the planet and its people? Like many years ago, due to global warming beginning, giant babies with ancient monster powers and monstrousness were awoken and terrorize the entire planet. The babies couldn't be stopped, and then one day some people came up with powerful magic that was able to reseal the giant babies across the planet and save the world but for only so much time. We had many years to get ready for their reawakening, but will it be enough?

What do you think?

He is invulnerable to most human weapons and can shoot lightning from his hands or a gravity beam from his mouth. He loves destroying cities and eating whole herds of large animals.

Want to use him?

choices: Evil Corporation Uses Giant Babies to Take Over World
1553322232.content: Hey guys, I got a super cool idea. What if some kids or adults had control of the world but used the giant babies to do their work for them? Like a corporation used a serum to make monster sized babies with powers and then implant them with mind control so they can be controlled. Then they used the giant babies to wreck havoc upon all those who stand in their way. They would force the humans to live underground and those unlucky enough to be captured serve the evil people that has control of the giant babies. Fun right?

choices: Government Project 2 - Accidentally creating queen of The babies
15533222322.content:
Maybe one of these then?


Government Project-
A slight twist on a previous suggestion..
The Government is trying to manipulate growth.
They create a serum but it doesn’t seem to work on adults.
One day the toddler daughter of someone involved with
the project falls into a tank of the serum.
Not only does the Serum work on the girl but
it seems to work a little too well.
The girl keeps having growth spurts, eventually outgrowing the lab
In the process she drinks the rest of the serum thinking it’s just a drink and becomes the growing queen of babies.
The only powers she developes are healing and telepathy.




Size Mishap-
A Daycare center orders some toys and baby formula
however the delivery company royally screws up
What happens when a shipment of size rays that look
like toy guns shows up and are given to the tiny tots to play with and the milk plus baby formula is actually shrinking formula or growth formula.
Well one things for sure one or more kid might soon reach new heights

info.brief_description: Babies begin growing and taking over the world.
info.description:
Babies are becoming giants and want to take over the world from their elders. They may want to get rid of adults or make them wear diapers.

-No blood or gore
-No sex involving minors
-Other than that, GO NUTS!
